meanings.definition: Shifted to a lower gear while driving.
meanings.sent1: The driver downshifted to climb the steep hill.
meanings.sent2: He downshifted when approaching a sharp turn.
meanings.sent3: The car downshifted unexpectedly, causing a jolt.
meanings.sent4: She downshifted her focus to tackle the difficult task.
meanings.sent5: Downshifted gears make the engine sound different.

meanings.definition: Moved to a lower position or level.
meanings.sent1: The downshifted chair was more comfortable for her.
meanings.sent2: The downshifted shelf was easier for the child to reach.
meanings.sent3: The downshifted position allowed for a better view of the stage.
meanings.sent4: The downshifted elevator took them to the basement level.
meanings.sent5: The downshifted seat cushion was softer than the others.

meanings.definition: Transitioned to a slower pace or lower intensity.
meanings.sent1: After a hectic day, she downshifted by taking a relaxing bath.
meanings.sent2: The music downshifted to a calming melody.
meanings.sent3: He downshifted his workout routine to avoid exhaustion.
meanings.sent4: The conversation downshifted to a more casual topic.
meanings.sent5: The party downshifted into a cozy gathering by the fireplace.
